backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining player profiles, AR spots, daily limits, chat, QMY purchases, and Stripe integration with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific patches to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing key frontend components, pages, and styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, fonts, and app root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup with all routes, providers, and page components registered.
frontend/src/components/Container.tsx: Reusable layout container component with configurable max-width sizes.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsentBan: Cookie consent banner with delayed appearance, accept handling, and privacy policy link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multi-column footer with branding, navigation links, and legal sections.
frontend/src/components/gold-paper/GoldP: Interactive visualization of global QMY hotspots with selectable details and regional breakdown display.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Defines the main site header with navigation, branding, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/InstitutionalExp: Provides a styled section wrapper with multilingual conceptual disclaimers and content slots.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with header, footer, lazy-loaded scene, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status display and button styling.
frontend/src/components/PageShell.tsx: Simple wrapper adding top padding and full-height layout for pages.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleL: Explorer UI for presale phases showing allocation, pricing, bonuses, and phase status with selectable tabs.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleU: Displays a vesting timeline with monthly unlock amounts and cumulative percentage progress.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Wrapper panel component providing glass-style card layout for profile sections.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Fixed HUD overlay showing live player profile stats such as nickname, energy, XP, and tokens.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Placeholder panels for upcoming profile modules like monsters, activity, and quick actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/useProfi: Hook computing authentication, registration, and profile setup visibility state.
frontend/src/components/quantum/QuantumU: Three.js scene rendering animated quantum particles, a field ring, and star background for ambiance.
frontend/src/components/ReadOnlyBanner.t: Displays a read-only warning banner with customizable message.
frontend/src/components/SectionNavigator: Full-screen navigation overlay listing site sections with availability indicators.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Renders a status badge with icon and color coding for draft, planned, or coming-soon states.
frontend/src/components/Typography.tsx: Provides styled typography components for titles and body text.
frontend/src/components/wallet/QMYTransa: Renders transaction history UI with loading, error, unsupported, empty, and populated states, including icons for different transaction types.
frontend/src/components/wallet/SendQMYSi: Provides a simulated QMY send form with validation, toast notifications, and API simulation handling.
frontend/src/components/wallet/VestingBr: Displays vesting info including available/locked amounts, progress bar, and countdown to next unlock.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Implements language context with translation support, persisted in localStorage for English and Portuguese.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCookieConsent.ts: Manages cookie consent state with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useDao.ts: Provides DAO proposal fetching, creation, and voting using simulated in-memory stores and identity-aware logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useICPLedger.ts: Fetches authenticated ICP balance from the on-chain ledger using an HttpAgent and ICP ledger client.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useLuxuryBank.ts: Fetches and derives mock luxury bank metrics, time series, and category breakdown data using a canister actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicChat.ts: Implements local-only public chat state with message sending simulation and basic message storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQMYLedger.ts: Fetches authenticated QMY ledger balance and formatting via an ICRC ledger client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQMYTransactions.ts: Retrieves authenticated QMY transaction history from the ICRC ledger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQMYVesting.ts: Returns null vesting info, indicating vesting data is not available on-chain.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides react-query hooks for user profiles, player registration, and player state via the canister actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulatedQMYVestin: Calculates simulated vesting data based on stored start date and allows toggling the simulation state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and utility classes including glass and QMY-themed styles.
Utility functions for percentage change, currency/number formatting, and generating sparkline path data.
frontend/src/lib/dao/preProposalsData.ts: Contains static DAO pre-proposal definitions with metadata and detailed sections.
frontend/src/lib/icp/account.ts: Implements ICP account identifier derivation using a custom SHA-224 stub and CRC32 checksum.
frontend/src/lib/icp/ledgerClient.ts: Provides a client for querying ICP balances via the ledger canister and includes balance formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/icrc/icrc.idl.ts: Defines the IDL interface for ICRC-1 ledger queries including metadata and balance functions.
frontend/src/lib/icrc/ledgerClient.ts: Implements an ICRC-1 ledger client for metadata and balance queries with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/icrc/transactions.ts: Attempts to query ICRC-1 transaction history and parses responses, returning null if unsupported.
frontend/src/lib/map/mapDatasets.ts: Contains predefined map marker datasets for coins and monsters with coordinates and names.
frontend/src/lib/map/simulatedMapProject: Provides a simple equirectangular projection converting latitude/longitude to screen coordinates.
frontend/src/lib/offline-manager.ts: Empty placeholder file for offline management logic.
Provides simulated central bank statistics including supply, usage, presale, and regional data.
frontend/src/lib/qmy/goldPaperSimData.ts: Returns simulated hotspot and regional allocation data for Gold Paper distribution.
frontend/src/lib/qmy/presaleSimData.ts: Supplies mock presale phase data including allocations, pricing, bonuses, and status.
frontend/src/lib/qmy/simulatedSend.ts: Simulates sending tokens with validation and random success/failure for testing.
frontend/src/lib/qmy/simulatedVesting.ts: Calculates vesting progress over time and determines next unlock amount and date.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page outlining project documentation sections and ecosystem overview with placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/ARDistributionPage.ts: Static conceptual AR distribution page with disclaimers and compliance notices.
frontend/src/pages/ARMode.tsx: Placeholder AR mode page showing a coming-soon card within a basic layout.
frontend/src/pages/BancoCentral.tsx: Simulated luxury bank dashboard displaying token metrics, charts, and KPIs using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/Colecao.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Localized contact page showing helpdesk email and website links for support.
frontend/src/pages/DAO.tsx: Empty DAO page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DAOCreateProposalPage: Form page for authenticated, registered users to create DAO proposals with validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DAOPage.tsx: DAO governance overview listing proposals with access control for authentication and registration.
frontend/src/pages/DAOProposalDetailPage: Displays proposal details with voting, revoking votes, and navigation back to the DAO list using hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Distribuicao.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Renders a documentation hub with categorized sections, status badges, and an educational disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/GameSystemsPage.tsx: Shows AR game mechanics, disclaimers, and future sync notes with language‑based content switching.
frontend/src/pages/GoldPaper.tsx: Displays the Gold Paper draft with disclaimers, table of contents, and structured conceptual documentation sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with animated visuals, language toggle, rotating text, and a CTA linking to the AR app.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero section, branding visuals, CTA, and a features grid. Uses animated UI components and themed styling.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Displays multilingual legal and compliance information, including disclaimers, GDPR details, and regulatory notices. Content is selected based on current language.
frontend/src/pages/MapMode.tsx: Shows a simulated world map with controls for adjusting center and zoom. Displays QMY coin and monster marker locations using a custom projection.
frontend/src/pages/Perfil.tsx: Provides profile authentication, registration, and editing flows using Internet Identity. Manages nickname updates and displays profile state with UI panels.
frontend/src/pages/PreProposalDetailPage: Fetches and displays details of a selected pre-proposal, including description, objective, impact, and full sections. Provides navigation back to the proposal list.
frontend/src/pages/PreProposalsPage.tsx: Renders a list of educational pre-proposals with details and navigation to individual proposal pages.
frontend/src/pages/PresalePage.tsx: Displays simulated presale data including allocation, phases, vesting, and visual explorers.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows a full privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, protection, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/PublicChatPage.tsx: Implements a simulated session-only public chat with message input, validation, and display.
frontend/src/pages/QMYTokenPage.tsx: Presents QMY token features and token information in a styled informational layout.
frontend/src/pages/QTMRules.tsx: Placeholder page for QTM game rules with a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Displays a conceptual roadmap with disclaimers, draft phases, and regulatory notes, emphasizing no commitments or operational promises.
frontend/src/pages/SwapPage.tsx: Renders a swap feature placeholder with authentication checks, a read‑only banner, and UI indicating the swap system is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/SwapQTMICP.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future QTM–ICP swap page.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalPage.tsx: Shows multilingual technical architecture details, listing canisters, compliance notes, and conceptual-only system explanations.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Presents the Terms of Service with sections on eligibility, user accounts, acceptable use, liability limits, and content ownership.
frontend/src/pages/TokenomicsPage.tsx: Provides a conceptual tokenomics overview with strong disclaimers and draft sections describing non-operational token models.
frontend/src/pages/TreasuryMonetaryPolic: Outlines a conceptual treasury and monetary policy framework with compliance notices and draft, non-operational content.
frontend/src/pages/Tutorial.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future tutorial page.
Renders a bilingual vesting and deflation info page with icons and two image sections.
frontend/src/pages/VestingQTM.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays a wallet dashboard with authentication handling, balances, vesting data, and transaction history.
frontend/src/utils/bigint.ts: Empty utility file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/distance.ts: Empty utility file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/VALIDATION_REQUIRED.md: Notes on institutional-safe build, completed changes, constraints, and next validation steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, sizes, shadows, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing patch requirements, known issues, and feature tracking.
public/.well-known/apple-app-site-associ: Empty configuration file for Apple app site association.
public/.well-known/assetlinks.json: Empty Android asset links configuration file.
